actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Lieutenant Commander Frederick R. Marlin, Junior, United States Navy.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full settlement of his claims against the United States relative to loss of personal property incident to change of station orders issued by the United States Navy.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Lieutenant Commander Frederick R. Marlin, Junior, United States Navy.
